text:
Created attachment 23177
Patch that correct the compilation error.

Due to commit :

Revision 64935
Modified Thu Mar 4 16:17:25 2004 UTC (4 years, 10 months ago) by jorton

Workaround odd behaviour of AF_UNSPEC lookups with AI_PASSIVE set on
some old versions of glibc:

* network_io/sockets/sockaddr.c (call_resolver): Ignore anything other
than AF_INET and AF_INET6 addresses.

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/apr/apr/trunk/network_io/unix/sockaddr.c?r1=64904&r2=64935&diff_format=h

APR compilation fails on platforms that don't support IPV6 because AF_INET6 is not defined. 

The correction is trivial and patch created from :
http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/apr/apr/trunk@737672

is attached to this bug report.

creator: bojan@rexursive.com
text: Committed to trunk, 1.4.x and 1.3.x. Thanks for the patch.
